short_summary: Purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture.
description: The CFIA has a requirement for the provision of Office Furniture in the Mirabel, QC office
duration_in_months: How ever many months leading up to June 13th.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Office Furniture Requirement: Mirabel, QC**

**Tender Details:**

* **Tender Reference Number:** 2023-01154
* **Publication Date:** April 25, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 5, 2023, 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** May 8, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** June 13, 2023

**Procurement Information:**

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Bid Requirements:**

* **Bidder Eligibility:** All interested bidders are eligible to bid
* **Bid Submission:** Interested bidders must submit their proposal in electronic format
* **Contract Award:** The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price

**Contact Information:**

* **Name:** Catherine Clairoux
* **Email:** [catherine.clairoux@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:catherine.clairoux@inspection.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** (343) 596-9265

**Document Attachments:**

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5040/2023-01154-npp.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5040/2023-01154-rfb.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5040/2023-01154-ias.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5040/2023-01154-apm.pdf

Note: The above tender has been cancelled._cancelled
